citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on
14-SEP-18.
Telephone contact was made with the licensee who was 1 and 1/2 hours away and not returning until early evening.
The licensee provided optimal hours during the telephone conversation.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on
14-SEP-18.
Telephone contact was made with the licensee who was 1 and 1/2 hours away and not returning until early evening.
 The licensee provided optimal hours during the telephone conversation.
